title: Install error 1935 c++ Visual Please Help!!
body: So i've tried to install League of Legends multiple times after resetting my computer, it originally ran and installed perfectly fine, but after I reset my computer it hasn't worked sense, I tried using this link >> https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/aAz1Q5L8-resolved-help-league-of-legends-wont-install-onto-windows-10 << Im running windows 10 **but LoL still wont install, Please Help!!**

replies.body: Whenever you reset your pc, you may not have installed Microsoft's C++ package correctly. You can try downloading it manually from [**this link**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387), and let me know if you're still having problems installing league after that!
